description: Episode of Series "World in action" Reports on political trials being held in Zanzibar where the accused are refused defence counsel and the prosecution admits that some of the evidence was obtained under torture. Includes an interview with Zanzibar's Attorney-General and Aboud Jumbe, Zanzibar's Head of State
